title: Databases & SQL
description: Briefly look under the hood at relational databases.

frontMatter.title: Databases & SQL
frontMatter.description: Briefly look under the hood at relational databases.
frontMatter.synopsis: Although it's an oversimplification, the network is like a bunch of SQL databases communicating & agreeing with one another about things that happened on-chain. It's important to understand the very basics of what databases are and why a relational is a perfect solution for scaling structured web3 data.
